Package iiv.filter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Croppable
    Croppable defines routines to allow handling the crop box for a component.
    FilterSampling
    FilterSampling defines routines to allow handling filter sample types for a component.
    Flippable
    Flippable defines routines to allow handling flip values for a component.
    Mapping2D
    Interface for classes that performs 2D mapping.
    Rotatable
    Rotatable defines routines to allow handling rotation values for a component.
    Zoomable
    Zoomable defines routines to allow handling zoom values for a component.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorFilter
    ColorFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer replacing the color model of the data.
    FlipFilter
    FlipFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer swapping pixels horizontally or vertically.
    LinearImageFilter
    LinearImageFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer applying a linear transform to an image.
    ShapeColorFilter
    ShapeColorFilter sits between an ImageProducer and ImageConsumer replacing the color model of the data.
